title: HiFlaky: Hierarchy-Aware Flakiness Classification
data:
Z Li, Z Wu, Y Lei, H Xie, M Li, J Hu- Journal of Systems and Software, 2025

or fail without changes to the source code, leading to developer frustration and 
wasted resources. Current methods for detecting and classifying flaky tests often
